name: Pixel Ninja
description:
This is a ninja action game made by Japanese.
Use your sword and shuriken to defeat your enemies.


The game is easy to operate.
You can play with direction button and 2 buttons.
Please see the following for the operation method.

Direction: move
X: Sword
Y: Shuriken



Feature:
・Smooth animation
・Japanese traditional music
・Flashy action
・Pixel art
・beat´m up
